segments.text: I wonder what he looks like . Oh , I can't wait to see him ! His email said he'd be wearing a white hat.oh , there he is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Logan ! Why on earth are you hiding here ? White hat ! Come on ! Don't tell me you're the guy ! It can't be true .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what a bummer ! You set me up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: let me explain . I didn't mean to hurt you ...
segments.speaker: S2
